This allows us to use your location to provide your near by service centre.
This allows us to use your location to provide your near by service centre

One of the highlighted features of Panasonic smart care mobile app is to help the customer to track the nearest authorized service centre location through mobile app to get his product repaired. This will benefit the customers to reach the right place for quality and guaranteed service from Panasonic authorized service centres.
